author: Music🤘🏼
text: Thoughts on weddings: why not just have a marriage officiate the union w/ you, spouse and witness now; then have the reception at a later date when this pandemic is under control?  I know several who have had big weddings and many tested positive for COVID.

author: Music🤘🏼
text: Radical thought:  can hospitals deny entry to those with Covid that could’ve been vaccinated, but refused?  #COVID #hospital #CovidVaccine
